name: Score-to-Inches Conversion
description: Convert [-1,+1] score to perceived height change in inches.
formula: MULTIPLIER = 2.25 (revised from 2.75 after Contradiction #10). scale = max(0.75, min(1.20, 1.0 + (62 - user_height)*0.025)). perceived_inches = score * MULTIPLIER * scale.
uncertainty: +/-25% on all inch estimates. +1.0 inch prediction = +0.75 to +1.25 in practice.

name: Confidence Tier Weights
description: Every principle carries a confidence weight that determines contribution to final aggregated score. Higher confidence = more influence. Weight = confidence^2.

name: Positive Aggregation Method
description: Confidence-weighted average for positive principles. Weight = confidence^2 to emphasize high-confidence principles.
formula: weighted_sum = sum(score * conf^2). weight_total = sum(conf^2). positive_total = (weighted_sum / weight_total) * 2.5. Capped at 0.70.

name: Sabotage Aggregation Method (Product-Complement)
description: Sabotage penalties use product-complement stacking (diminishing returns). Each individual penalty capped at 0.40 before stacking.
formula: remaining = 1.0. For each penalty p (sorted largest first): remaining *= (1.0 - min(0.40, |p|)). sabotage_total = -(1.0 - remaining).
rationale: Product-complement ensures multiple small penalties compound realistically without exceeding -1.0, and diminishing returns mirror real perception.

name: Final Score Combination
description: Final score = positive_total + sabotage_total, clamped to [-1.0, +1.0]. Simple additive combination of positive (up to +0.70) and sabotage (down to -1.0).

name: Sabotage Interaction Matrix
description: Some sabotage penalties amplify or attenuate each other when co-occurring.
confidence_note: ALL 12 interaction values are geometric reasoning with ZERO empirical backing. Confidence: 25%. Most fabricated numbers in entire system.

name: Confidence Interval Calculation
description: Uncertainty on perceived inches based on average confidence of active components.
formula: uncertainty_pct = 0.55 - avg_confidence * 0.45. ci_low = perceived_inches * (1 - uncertainty_pct). ci_high = perceived_inches * (1 + uncertainty_pct). At avg_confidence 0.90: +/-15%. At avg_confidence 0.50: +/-40%.

name: Compound Body-Type Modifier Multiplication
description: Users with multiple body types get ALL applicable modifiers multiplied together.

name: Petite Amplifier Formula
description: Effects are amplified on petite frames. 1.0 at 5'6", 1.50 at 4'10".

name: CIEDE2000 Color Distance Thresholds
description: All color comparisons use CIEDE2000 perceptually uniform distance metric.

name: Build Order by Scoring Variance
description: Implementation priority ordered by percentage of scoring variance explained.

priorities.P1_40pct: Shoe height (P1) + Proportion (P7) + Monochromatic column (P2) = MVP scoring
priorities.P2_20pct: Color break (S1) + Hemline (S2) = Core sabotage detection
priorities.P3_15pct: Body-type detection + modifier layer = Personalization begins
priorities.P4_10pct: Waist elevation (P3) with ratio gate = Highest-value insight
priorities.P5_5pct: Nude shoe with skin-tone matching (P6) = Signature differentiation
priorities.P6_10pct: Remaining principles + interaction matrix = Full engine
